name: African Peanut Soup
author: PIETOGO
summary: This oddly wonderful combination of ingredients make a surprisingly different and delicious soup that everyone will enjoy! Serve with a dollop of sour cream on top and some crusty bread for dipping. YUM!
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes, with liquid
⅔ cup extra crunchy peanut butter
directions: Heat oil in a large stock pot over medium high heat
Cook onions and bell peppers until lightly browned and tender, stirring in garlic when almost done to prevent burning
Stir in tomatoes, vegetable stock, pepper, and chili powder
Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes
Stir in rice, cover, and simmer another fifteen minutes or until rice is tender
Stir in peanut butter until well blended, and serve
